message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $800,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $950,000. I believe this price reflects its true worth while allowing you to enjoy significant savings compared to its market value. I am confident that this investment will bring you great satisfaction and return on your investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
